TEXT.TITLE: MENTOR CORP (MNTR.O) TO REPURCHASE SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Mentor Corp said its board of directors has authorized a plan to repurchase up to two mln shares of its common stock, subject to market conditions and the company's own financial position. Reuter
